data.title: Easy peasy coffee.
data.text:
Great coffee, super friendly service and very knowledgeable.
Sound of kids playing in the back and as a parent we need to allow family life to cross over. So I liked it.
Laid back, don't go expecting to rush out with your main street brand name coffee in 4 minutes flat. Bring a book and enjoy getting away if only briefly.

data.title: Super friendly and laid back
data.text:
Popped in for some coffee. The owner was busy preparing lunch for other customers and said she'd be right out. I was greeted by her son. You can tell this place is family friendly and that they care.  

She offers coconut milk, almond milk, 2% and 1/2 & 1/2. She suggested coconut milk with my iced coffee and I loved it. I brought my daughter back in a few days later and she remembered me. 

This is such a cute place to hang out. There are a few artsy items for sale and some board games you can play. Sometimes there's music as well. 

I didn't see a menu and was told she was working on it. She had gluten-free and grain free items for purchase. Go check it out!

data.title: Great coffee shop!
data.text: This place has the best atmosphere ever! Super friendly owners & an eclectic furniture collection make you feel right at home. The coffee & food are very boutique - made one at a time - with love!

data.title: Great stuff!
data.text: Great tea selection and neat downtown atmosphere!  We stopped in after our son started his semester at ASU.   I really think I could enjoy hanging out for a long afternoon of delicious tea and calm atmosphere!
